title: Deliciously soft vegan coffee cake
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '75g wholegrain self-raising flour', '110g granulated sugar', '200g light brown soft sugar', '150g coconut oil', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '100ml strong coffee', '250ml almond or soy milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '90g dairy free coconut yoghurt', 'For the icing', 'icing sugar', '20ml strong coffee']
